N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.11 - Third parties

State Regulations
(a) If the
applicant has received the prior written approval of the Office of Mental

Health to authorize a third party to operate the facility or which a State aid
grant or Housing Finance Agency mortgage pursuant to this Part is sought or has
been received, then the applicant will obtain contractual assurances equivalent
to the assurances contained in this Part from any such agency. The OMH shall at
all times retain the authority to review such contractual arrangements and
determine their adequacy. (b) If
the applicant intends to enter into a rental agreement or other agreement
whereby the applicant obtains possession to the premises upon which the
facility will be located, with an entity which is owned or controlled by the
applicant, the applicant will require that entity to contractually agree to
permit the OMH, its designees or representatives to have access to the books of
that entity as they relate to the subject premises. Such contractual
arrangements will be made on the advice and consent of the OMH. The OMH may
waive this requirement when in the sole discretion of the OMH it is appropriate
to do so. Notes
